column4: hello there, I have (L)ubuntu on my laptop on dual boot with windows 7, I am having to reinstall windows 7 due to a virus, i have already backed up, I am thinking of upgrading to (L)ubuntu 11.04 my question is the following, can I leave ubuntu untouched and install the new version of windows where the version of windows i am deleting is currently on(partitionwise) and otherwise what is more convenient, installing ubuntu first or windows first th
ank you -YT: Sebastian Ortiz, first principles
windoze will overwrite GRUB, you will have to repair it
OEM allows you to do a basic install, without personal data, the user then can continue the install whenever he wants
